member.name: F:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.Agent.Http.HttpServer.Started
member.summary: Raised when the listener is initialized but before starting to service requests.

member.name: F:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.Agent.Http.HttpServer.Stopped
member.summary: Raised when the listener stops after servicing the last request.

member.name: P:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.Agent.Http.HttpServer.Uri
member.summary: The URI of the listener. Is only valid after the Started event is raised and before the Stopped event is raised.

member.name: M:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.Agent.Http.HttpServer.Run(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Run the REST agent server on the command line. Status messages will be displayed to the console.

member.name: M:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.Agent.Http.HttpServer.Run(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Run the REST agent server on the specified port. No status messages are displayed and the function will not complete until Stop() is called.

member.name: M:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.Agent.Http.HttpServer.Run(System.UInt16,System.UInt16)
member.summary: Run the REST agent server on the first free port, starting with minport and searching until maxport. No status messages are displayed and the function will not complete until Stop() is called.

member.name: M:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.Agent.Http.HttpServer.Stop
member.summary: Stops the listener from accepting new requests. Causes Run() to complete.

member.name: M:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.CrackingTests.ArrayTests.CrackArrayStopAtMax
member.summary: We should stop cracking at maxOccurs. Question, should we throw an exception or just stop?

member.name: M:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.ReportedTests.ObjectCopierExplode
member.remarks: input data attached. For some reason stalls in the ObjectCopier clone method trying to deserialze a 120 megabyte (!) memory stream of a Dom.Number... Wonder what the heck the serializer is doing..

member.name: M:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.ReportedTests.CrackNoExplode
member.summary: Proper data bytes for model of CrackExplode

member.summary: Fuzz from iteration 1 to 10 Fault on 'faultIter' Reproduce fault on 'faultIter' How often to run control iterations

member.name: T:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.ManyChildren
member.summary: All child elements occur many times

member.name: T:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.SingleChildren
member.summary: All children occur a single time

member.name: T:Peach.Pro.Test.Core.MixedChildren
